For <S%G1063><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> to Moses <S%G3475><s%>, I will have mercy on <S%G1653><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I will have mercy <S%G1653><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will have compassion <S%G3627><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I will have compassion <S%G3627><s%>.

Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> hath he mercy <S%G1653><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> he will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy, and <S%G1161><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he will <S%G2309><s%> he hardeneth <S%G4645><s%>.

Thou wilt say <S%G2046><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> doth he yet <S%G2089><s%> find fault <S%G3201><s%>? For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> hath resisted <S%G436><s%> his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G1013><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%>, which followed <S%G1377><s%> after the law <S%G3551><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, hath <S%G5348><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> attained <S%G5348><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1302><s%>?
